Mitt Romney made no secret of his criticism of Donald Trump during the 2016 presidential campaign , but until now , he [V: had] not publicly revealed who he voted for : his wife , Ann .

Mitt Romney made no secret of his criticism of Donald Trump during the 2016 presidential campaign , but until now , he had not publicly revealed who [ARG0: he] [V: voted] [ARG1: for] : his wife , Ann .
